description: Currently you are using this application. Describe it yourself!
As the name suggests, the main idea of this application is currencies comparing, to find the most profitable exchange rate
out of many online currency exchange services. Application supports many curriences in accordance with ISO 4217 standard.
Simulation engine of processes taking place in Supermarkets. Main goal of this simulation is to examine, how many cash registers
should have to be opened, to queue does not exceed given length with certain simulation parameters.
Car rental wizard guide with voice assistant and speech controlled view.
Application used to solving IT system diagnosis structures optimization problem, based on own created algorithm that includes Hakimi-Amin theorem.
First person shooter game being a clone of Half-Life on unity engine, introducing features characteristic for modern FPS games.
